Package dedede.model.persistence.daos

Class CategoryDao

java.lang.Object
dedede.model.persistence.daos.CategoryDao
public final class CategoryDao
extends java.lang.Object
This DAO (data access object) manages data pertaining to a category. A category can be defined to categorize different mediums. Specifically, this DAO implements the CRUD methods (create, read, update, delete). See the CategoryDto class for the used DTO.

      public CategoryDao()

  • Method Details

    • createCategory

      public static void createCategory​(CategoryDto categoryDto)
      Enters category data into the persistent data store. The enclosed ID must not be associated with an existing data entry in the data store.
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      CategoryDto

    • updateCategory

      public static void updateCategory​(CategoryDto categoryDto)
      Overwrites existing category data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      CategoryDto

    • deleteCategory

      public static void deleteCategory​(CategoryDto categoryDto)
      Deletes existing category data from the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - A DTO container with the ID of the entry to be deleted
      See Also:
      CategoryDto

    • loadCategory

      public static CategoryDto loadCategory()

    • getAllCategories

      public static Page<CategoryDto> getAllCategories​(int pageSize, int pageNumber)
      Fetches a paged list of categories from the persistent data store. The order of the data and concurrent behaviour is unspecified.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - The number of data elements being returned
      pageNumber - The page number in the conceptual data order, referring to the page size
      Returns:
      A paginated list of DTO containers with the category data.
      See Also:
      CategoryDto

    • searchCategory

      public static Page<CategoryDto> searchCategory​(java.lang.String text, int pageSize, int pageNumber)
      Fetches a paged list of categories from the persistent data store, for which a search filter is applied to the name first. The order of the data and concurrent behaviour is unspecified.
      Parameters:
      text - The search term (case-insensitive), which the name must contain
      pageSize - The number of data elements being returned
      pageNumber - The page number in the conceptual data order, referring to the page size
      Returns:
      A paginated list of DTO containers with the category data.
      See Also:
      CategoryDto
